events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position, including their resume and cover letter.
The recruitment team has categorised the application under the Engineering cluster after reviewing the candidate's background and keywords.
A recruiter specialized in software engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate’s recruitment process.
The initial screening call went well. The candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of programming languages and software development principles.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the available technical interview slots proposed by the recruiter.
A technical interview with the lead software developer has been scheduled for the candidate to assess coding and system design skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, impressing the panel with problem-solving abilities and practical coding solutions.
Following the positive technical interview, an HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate’s motivations, culture fit, and benefits.
The HR interview was completed smoothly with good engagement from the candidate, answering questions about work preferences and career goals.
An official job offer was proposed to the candidate including salary details and other employee benefits, reflecting the company's interest.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed appreciation for the transparent recruitment process.
The candidate accepted the job offer, confirming their commitment to join the engineering team as a software developer.
The onboarding process has started for the new hire, including account setups, introductory meetings, and access to developer resources.
The recruitment case has been successfully closed after the candidate's onboarding was completed and they began their new role in engineering.
